title: Bridal & Event Styling
summary: On-location or in-shop grooming for groomsmen, photo shoots, and red-carpet moments.
description: Turn wedding mornings and high-profile events into a curated grooming lounge. We handle timeline coordination, touch-up stations, and signature looks for every member of the party. Travel-ready kits and finishing sprays included.
processTitle: How we run your event grooming lounge
processDescription: From the first consult to final touch-ups, we coordinate logistics so every member of the party steps out camera ready.

processSteps.title: Vision & logistics consult
processSteps.description: We confirm location, party size, timeline, and desired looks, then build a run-of-show tailored to your event.

processSteps.title: On-site lounge setup
processSteps.description: Our team arrives early with mobile stations, lighting, grooming tools, and refreshments.

processSteps.title: Touch-ups & finale
processSteps.description: We manage chair rotation, final checks, and pack-up so you transition seamlessly into photos or ceremony.
